name: Coolangatta / Kirra Beach YHA

reviews.text: I came up from Melbourne to get a little Gold Coast sun and sand!
reviews.title: Awesome

reviews.text: Clean, comfy, cheap AND a met a bunch of great people who really made my trip :) good times!
reviews.title: Worst hostel ever

reviews.text: Cooly YHA is the perfect base for anyone wanting to explore the Goldie.
reviews.title: Not for everyone.

likes.liked: — Cheap and could walk to the airport very early without worrying about transport.
likes.disliked: — Noisy, rundown, inconsiderate guests, uncomfortable bed, could be cleaner.

reviews.text: My friend and i went there in september 2009 and stayed for 5 nights in a 2 bed room. This room was extremly dirty and bedding was unclean, The room was infested with ants, the pool was extremely unclean as was the hostel in general and never have i been some where, where the staff are SO rude. One good thing that i can say about this place is the complementry bus and breakfast. I would NOT reccomend this place to any one.
reviews.title: Very loud and inconsiderate guests

reviews.text: I stayed here for a few nights before flying out of the Gold Coast airport. I chose this location because of the airport ( 5 minute walk!!) but did not find it too out of the way like some other reviews. there is a 4 times daily free shuttle to Rainbow Bay Beach, Snapper Rocks and Tweed Heads.I also took the bus to Surfers Paradise about an hour away on public transit. Cleaning needs to be improved- a colony of flies flew in and died in the washroom overnight and were not cleaned until after noon the next day- but otherwise a good stay.
reviews.title: Great Location (for flying) Free shuttle bus, Good stay!

reviews.text: The hostel is a bit out of town but there is a free shuttle service from the hostel several times a day and there are also regular public buses. If you're using the airport this place is ideal - literally 5 minutes' walk away. Free breakfast is included, as well as free tea and coffee at any time. There is a good kitchen and nice communal/dining area. The staff were very friendly and helpful and we felt at ease here. There was a TV area with lots of sofa, ideal for relaxing in front of a film. Overall we really enjoyed our stay here.
reviews.title: Good value and a nice place to stay

reviews.text: Convenient for airport and beach, but a bit "out of town". Regular busses into town, but rather expensive. Friendly staff and good atmosphere. Good facilities - clean and comfortable. Very good value with breakfast included. Well recomended.
reviews.title: Great value, nice hostel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My partner and I recently stayed in a 2 person room for a weekend on the GC - reason we booked it was price and location (needed to be close to Coolangatta).
reviews.title: Great rates, including breakfast too!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: After calling around, the price for a double room at this YHA was far cheaper than the other hostels & B&Bs in the area. The bonus was that the price also included a continental breakfast, so that was great!
reviews.title: For a budget airport hotel, it's fine

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The location is right next to airport, hence it's convenient for those who want to take early flight.
reviews.title: Stay somewhere else except want to take early flight

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: However, quality of sleep might be interrupted due to plane noise.
reviews.title: Worst location ever

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Cleanliness wise, the blanket is unclean with yellow spots, the spider webs were everywhere near the door and windows.
reviews.title: Well run place but out of town with not much going on!

reviews.text: The worst thing is that we had bed bugs bite after staying one night there, the redness and itchiness is everywhere on the hand and doctor has proven is the bugs bite :(
reviews.title: Stay elsewhere if you can

reviews.text: This YHA has really the worst location ever. You have to take the bus into town which will cost you 12 dollar if travelling with 2 persons. The hostel is next to the highway and airport.If you want to come to Coolangatta for the beaches and great surf than please stay in the center. We recommend KOMUNE and SANDS Hostel. You will have a good time there and than you can enjoy Cooly as you should, it is beautiful !
reviews.title: Its close to the airport

aka: Coolangatta / Kirra Beach YHA Bilinga, Australia - Gold Coast
description: Sunshine, endless golden beaches, a breathtaking hinterland right at your door step and home to some of the best surf breaks in the world. We are located in Coolangatta, just a 5 minute walk from the Gold Coast airport and right across the road from Bilinga Beach. With a fun and laid back atmosphere, regular BBQ nights and very friendly staff, you'll feel right at home during your stay here with us at Cooly YHA. Our hostel is the ideal springboard for all the activities and adventures the Gold Coast has on offer! Free breakfast & shuttle bus! YHA/HI members receive a 10% discount on all accommodation.
